title: Patch notes 7.15 - what they really mean :3
body:
Its time for another round OF PATCH NOTES :D , is the beginning of the  worlds patch (Edit: beginning of the qualifiers for the world patch) so we decided to do some... interesting stuff this time , hope u enjoy ! :D
(IF YOU MISSED THE PREVIOUS PATCH NOTESCLICK [[THIS]](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/EgggEQH7-patch-notes-714-what-they-really-mean-3) )
{{champion:6}} - We are removing the champ known as "urgot" from the game and replacing him with a new champ with the same name (Sorry urgot mains </3). This thing is going to be OP on release (Especially in lower elo), so abuse it while you can! (Edit: I was wrong, people aren't having much luck on him XD)
Pshh Also, he is really good against tanks since his ult kills enemies based off of remaining HP, dood pick this guy into cho ;)
{{champion:84}} - This champ is actually not bad right now, but our boy shiptur said if we buffed akali he would finally carry a delta fox series which would of course boost our LCS views , which equal more revenue... which we would of course spend on making league a better game... of course. So we decided she should be invis more , so lower w cd , o and stronger passive ay. 
{{champion:268}} - Was buffed, still unplayable. 
{{champion:31}}  - 
http://s2.quickmeme.com/img/82/82d177e50a6e13a386ac761f5ddac5cc653589721e2aa7533da5ba3ff4497df0.jpg
^ This is bascially cho atm, we could/should nerf his whole "Stoneplate press R oneshot adc" ... but lol that shit to fun so we just nerfing his e XD
{{champion:36}} - More magic resist. k
{{champion:245}} - Buffed E 
https://i.gyazo.com/1ad45ea41ad3cef5fdb399e45f825786.png
{{champion:60}} - Less AD , k.
{{champion:81}} - Taric is finally strong champ , but he is missing his bae and we need him back in the meta, so ez.. its your time... lower Q cd, cause that will totally help. 
http://orig05.deviantart.net/ef09/f/2013/005/3/9/lol_pink_taric__he_man_version__by_redcoke-d5qhgse.jpg
{{champion:41}} - Passive has 5 more dmg 
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/SPXwX8ZNF1w/maxresdefault.jpg
{{champion:39}} - Lower Ult Cooldown, Gbay maybe you will quit complaining about not being able to get masters , "Meddler we can't put that in the patch notes it will trigger some people", sigh ok. 
{{champion:222}} - Jinx has a lower W cooldown, Now she will be op and will be the best adc! 
https://www.mememaker.net/static/images/memes/3502460.jpg
{{champion:141}} - His ult will actually do damage now! I hope everyone is happy this be-kayn a thing ;)
{{champion:99}} -
Low elo hates her ... https://i.gyazo.com/58a1e742ce3d9439a9487825f2439e38.png
Low elo fears  her ... https://i.gyazo.com/adb5a1c612fcdeeb5dead57cc66e55d2.png
because they can't beat her ... https://i.gyazo.com/24e08e7ca3f4fc9cb905ea99566a29ec.png
Were buffing her, thats about it, time for the boards posts raging :O
{{champion:75}} - Guys its time we say farewell to top nasus.... BECAUSE ITS TIME FOR SUPPORT NASUS TO RISE, WE ARE INCREASING HIS E ARMOUR SHRED :D , o ye he also has lower Q cd in ult.. kinda strong but what eva.
{{champion:111}} - Q and E dmg up, still no reason to play him over champs like cho... sorry naut ... 
https://i2.wp.com/picsmine.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/New-sadness-man-Sad-Memes.jpg
{{champion:102}} - Meddler: "Shit guys game of thrones season 7 started the dragons hype is gonna build what do we do, well we have shyvana in the game.... - we could give her a kahlessi skin - , mhm no no , lets just buff her... dont wanna spend to many resources on a dead champ ... simmer down simmer down..."
{{champion:27}} - We made this champ fun again... and then the boards complained and hotfixed him and now he is meh again.... heh, lets buff him and go through this cycle again ...
{{champion:15}} - (Has internal debate on if i should re use this meme...) "Sivir bought a fidget spinner, this has overall upgraded her Q dmg"
https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DAAMSWyXgAAfsU9.jpg
{{champion:4}} - He moves faster....
https://media.giphy.com/media/yXVO50FJIJMSQ/giphy.gif
{{champion:101}} - Our balance team is actually on vacation so we let @Riot Tantram deal with this one, we didn't actually think he would buff xerath... will be fixed after next patch.. expect to see him at worlds...
{{champion:154}} - 
https://i.imgflip.com/1t2o1l.jpg
{{champion:115}} - Ziggs has a new skin coming out but isn't see the play we want him to... lets just buff him! And then people will want to buy the skin :D

LASTLY, we nerfed duskblade but lethality still OP, LOL ye its gonna take us a few patchs to nerf it back to hell, until then chow ^_^



{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Leave a thumbs up and subsc------ "Anthony this isn't your youtube channel, what the hell are you doing....."

replies.body: What? as far as im aware lethality itself wasnt op. ITs just duskblade.
Thats a good point, I guess we will see this patch.

the duskblade nerf barely affects it at all. -50 damage t level 1 lol... you finish it level 6-7. at which point it's only -30 damage. by mid game the nerf is negligible. 

the slow not working for ranges is good... but the stats on the item are still high.

Maybe it will get the CotC treatment where it takes 2-3 patches for the item to be balanced because Riot's too hesitant on actually touching the item due to ADC's holding them hostage if they touch the item even further.
well the nerfed the slow on raged champs so that's a great start. Still when you see every AD champ building it it's like woah! what the heck!?
"League of legends actual patch spotlight"

It's strange, they buffed 16 champs in one patch.
Since they can't balance everyone, do they want to make everyone overpowered?
None of the champs are overpowered if they're all overpowered!
http://i1.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/001/218/908/247.gif
They should just buff kalista back for shits and giggles.
That is 100% me on the floor after reading Nautilus changes.

Shows you that riot has actually no clue what they are doing. 
Yes nauti Q damage is exactly what he needed to succed in toplane or jungle.

> [{quoted}](name=GayFluffyUnicorn,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Ax0iqpNA,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2017-07-26T15:47:30.891+0000)
>
> Shows you that riot has actually no clue what they are doing. 
> Yes nauti Q damage is exactly what he needed to succed in toplane or jungle.

I actually play Nautilus support but I don't think these tiny early game buffs will help him much there either.

That was my reaction at first too, but in theory the q buff should make his ganks more deadly, especially since it's biggest at rank one and you won't be leveling q first, and the ult cd buff should let him gank more often. Maybe it'll help his jungle somewhat.
i feel only dread  as a shyvana main ;-;

>https://i.gyazo.com/58a1e742ce3d9439a9487825f2439e38.png

http://i2.kym-cdn.com/entries/icons/original/000/020/147/1452161125531.png
Sir you deserve 9999999999999 upvotes,I hope to see this for 7.16 aswell! :D
<3 Of course, I think we might see some crazy things in 7.16 since its after/later in worlds so riot can go balls deep.
7.18 is the worlds patch though......7.15 and 16 are the Worlds Qualifier patches.
Its why i put the "Beginning of the worlds patch"

Hm...
I don't like the Lux changes. Shield boost if she's being a support...
They want to kick her out of mid.

Her shield used to actually be good. Then they changed the way it moved and it sucked for supporting. Now they are buffing the Shit out of the ratio to make her a useful support again. Just revert the shield and done. Fuck riot loves going n circles.

Yeah, they changed the movement to make it easier to hit allies.
They then changed from a refresh to an additive shield, thus weakening its power - especially along with the slower travel time.
Funny that I played nasus support yesterday xD
I mean, not nasus, my boi susan

Honestly seems like you just went though gameplay and look at the top threads, then did your best to include the messages from them in the post in some way. Unless they praised Riot of course, if they did, you burned them in a fire.
The gameplay boards are a joke with in themselves so i do get inspiration from them ;)
Still, not trying to be a dick or anything, but it seemed like you were just trying to farm upvotes by simply reposting the popular opinion.
http://i58.tinypic.com/2u6ofom.jpg

Riot about chogath:

https://i.imgflip.com/1t3d16.jpg
But... but they did nerf him...
R still broken XD
Agreed, but regardless, it's a nerf.
This was a great idea. Now you just have to make the jokes funny and you're all set. :D

you have some seriously incorrect facts in this post
such as "gp passive +5 damage", which is completely inaccurate as it was 15 damage
im going to assume you made all those bad assumptions you did simply  to make your post more interesting so i retain some scant measure of respect for you
Dood its under memes and games for a reason lol
i get that, but your facts are completely wrong
Which one of yall bitches didnt SMASH THAT MUFUCKIN LIKE BUTTON? Cause I can tell many of you didn't SMASH THAT MUFUCKIN LIKE BUTTON. Take my upvote.

You get the up vote for the Zac one alone. 

Just admit you took a balanced AP bruiser, tried to make him a tank with gaggles of CC, and effed up. His kit is super hard to balance. He's a support now because you HAVE to crush his clear or damage to keep him from broken.
[meanwhile at rito's headquarter](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=04wsnvjntLY)
You forgot one important change that was hidden among bug fixes that may break an S tier support : ^)
I dont go over bug fix's, if your talking about the thresh one I actually dont think its a big deal.
Lower CD on Ezreal means a faster tear. Which means he can hit a Manamune power spike faster, thusly being OPOP.
Up you go{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
They increase GP passive dmg by 15, not 5.
Oh my gosh... This is perfect... You must make one for every patch!

>  Guys its time we say farewell to top nasus.... BECAUSE ITS TIME FOR SUPPORT NASUS TO RISE, WE ARE INCREASING HIS E ARMOUR SHRED :D , o ye he also has lower Q cd in ult.. kinda strong but what eva.

Actually in early game his E will be worse, as a support as well, since a maxed out E in lane could reduce adcs armor to 0. In late he will be way better though.
I really hope they don't nerf Xerath's Q damage to "balance out the buffs he received."  It will of course be Q because that's his waveclear and poke.
PLEASE.... SHYVANA....
